channel.title: Unix Eqn on Charles, etc
channel.description: Recent content in Unix Eqn on Charles, etc

item.title: Eqn vs LaTeX
item.description: Take the LaTeX code: -1 \cdot \frac{1}{n}}\cup \{-1, \frac{1}{n}\} Do you know what this means? difficult parse visually. uses lots of hard-to-type symbols. Not only that, TeX by itself takes up 338.8 MB! Eqn -1 cdot 1 over n union left { -1 , 1 over n right } How’s that for readability! This is eqn: a math preprocessor on the layout engine groff. By the same metric, groff takes up 8 MB.
